description.text1: is a GitHub parent organization that manages and coordinates multiple sub-organizations across different domains. From
description.text2: to enterprise solutions, we foster collaboration and innovation.

coreAims.title: Guiding Principles
coreAims.description: Our mission is driven by a set of core principles that ensure we deliver innovative, high-quality, and collaborative open-source solutions.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We encourage creative approaches and experimental projects across our sub-organizations, pushing boundaries in their respective domains.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Every project under our umbrella maintains high standards, from code quality to user experience, ensuring reliable and maintainable solutions.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We facilitate cross-organization collaboration, sharing knowledge and resources to create stronger, more cohesive open source ecosystems.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: All our projects are open source, promoting transparency, community involvement, and the free exchange of ideas and code.

projects.title: Our Organizations
projects.subtitle: Each sub-organization focuses on specific domains, from gaming to enterprise solutions, all working together under the Axulogic umbrella.

nexusDb.description: A comprehensive database solution designed for modern applications, providing robust data management and scalability.

synapseFlow.description: An innovative workflow automation platform that streamlines processes and enhances productivity across teams.

heliosUi.description: A modern UI component library built for developers, offering customizable and accessible design systems.

techStack.title: Technology Stack
techStack.subtitle: Our organizations work with diverse technologies, from game engines to enterprise frameworks, ensuring the right tools for each project.
